subject: No confirmation email, nor tracking after a week since ordered
description_text: I have been waiting almost a week now for my order. I haven’t even got a confirmation email, I took a screenshot of my order number. When i go to look up my order number it says it doesn’t exist. I also have a bank statement from where the money was transferred out. Please contact me so we can resolve this issue.

conversations.body_text: Hi Connor Fox,    This is your logistics tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047072978374
